message:
Hi {{doc.full_name}},

We are happy to inform you that we have received your talk submission for {{ doc.event_name }}. Your contribution is greatly valued and we look forward to reviewing.

Title of Your Proposal: {{ doc.talk_title }}

  • Our review panel will carry out a meticulous review of all proposals after the submission deadline.
  • Post deadline, you will receive feedback on your proposal, as well as information about its status. Our goal is to curate a selection of talks that inspire, inform, and engage our community.

Once again, we thank you for your contribution. Should you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Write to us at foundation@fossunited.org or join our telegram channel.


Best Regards,

The FOSSUnited Team
name: CFP Submission Acknowledgement
subject: {{ doc.event_name }} CFP Submitted Successfully!
